logger_sqlite3.h File Reference

This logger module only provides convenient wrapper method over logger::err() to log sqlite3 error messages. More...

#include "logger.h"
#include <sqlite3.h>

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define SQLITE3_ERR(db, msg,...)
#define SQLITE3_ERR_STR(err_str, msg,...)

Functions

void sqlite3_err (const char *file, unsigned int line, sqlite3 *db, const char *msg,...)
void sqlite3_err_str (const char *file, unsigned int line, char **err_str, const char *msg,...)

Detailed Description

This logger module only provides convenient wrapper method over logger::err() to log sqlite3 error messages.

Define Documentation

msg,
...   ) 

Value:

sqlite3_err (__FILE__, __LINE__, db,    \
                                               msg , ## __VA_ARGS__)
Convenient wrapper for calling sqlite_err.

#define SQLITE3_ERR_STR ( err_str,
msg,
...   ) 

Value:

sqlite3_err_str (__FILE__, __LINE__, \
                                                            &err_str,   \
                                                            msg , ## __VA_ARGS__)
Convenient wrapper for calling sqlite_err_str (NO need to free err_str).

Function Documentation

unsigned int  line,

Log the last sqlite3 error message from the DB.
